help.intro: lets have fun together here on Discord (/^â–½^)/ Commands you can write:
help.bug: get the Link of the support discord
help.add: Get a link to add me to your server
help.voice: i join the Voice Channel you are currently in (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.silent: i leave the Voice Channel i am currently connected to. (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.play: Play a Song/Youtube Video max Length: 1H30M (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.pause: Pause the Current Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.resume: Resume the pause Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.volume: Sets the Volume of the Bot, Values between 1-200 (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.forever: Temporarely disabled until i fixed it
help.search: Searches for a Song in the Bot Database and shows the 5 best Results
help.skip: Skips the Current Song (only usable with WolkeBot Role)
help.voteskip: Starts a Voteskip for the current Song, more than 50% of the channel have to vote, then it is skipped.
help.qa: Adds a Song/Youtube Video to the Queue max Length: 1H30M
help.qra: removes either all Songs except the one that is playing right now or a certain number of songs (requires WolkeBot Role)
help.rq: Adds a random Song/a number of songs to the Queue
help.osu: Deprecated as Osu Songs can now be downloaded with the normal music commands
help.yts: Searches Youtube and gives you the First Result
help.ytq: Searches Youtube and adds the First Result to the Queue
help.mod-info: These Commands all require that the user has a Discord Role named WolkeBot
help.info: gives you some information about the current server
help.ban: Bans a User and deletes 7 Days of his/her messages
help.rm: removes the last 10 Messages, you can change 10 to a value between 1-100
help.noLevelServer: Disables the level system for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.noPmServer: Disables the pm notifications for the entire server, use the command again to re-enable it
help.setLewd: Adds the current Channel as a NSFW Channel
help.remLewd: Removes the current channel from the list of NSFW channels
help.r34: Searches Rule34 for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.kona: Searches Konachan for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.e621: Searches E621 for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.yandere: Searches Yande.re for tags and gives back 1 Image, only usable with WolkeBot Role or a configured NSFW Channel.
help.level: Your Level and XP needed for next Level
help.noLevel: disables the level system for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.noPm: disables the PM notifications for you. Use again to enable it again for you.
help.pp: Calculates PP for the beatmap with optional accuracy and mods
help.cookie: Gives a cookie to the mentioned user or shows your cookies if no one is mentioned. (giving cookies is only usable with WolkeBot role)
help.git: Gives you the github link of the bot
help.roll: Roles a a number between zero and number, if there is no number it will be out of 10
help.8ball: Gives you the Opinion of the magic 8ball to a question
help.garfield: Gives you a random garfield command
help.feedback: For feedback use the support discord please ^^
help.talk: If you want to talk with me @mention me with a message :D
help.helpReply: OK, I send you a list of commands over PM.

version: Currently i am running on version {{version}}
add: Use this Link to add me to your Server: {{link}}
bug: Please join the support Discord: {{link}} to report a Bug.

joinVoice.join: Ok, joining your voice channel now
joinVoice.error: An Error has occured while trying to join Voice!
joinVoice.permission: No Permission! You need to give yourself the WolkeBot Role to use this.
joinVoice.no-voice: You are not in a Voice Channel!

ban.privilege: My Role does not have the Privilege to ban {{user}} !
ban.err: An Error occurred while trying to ban {{user}} !
ban.ban-perms: You can not ban the Owner or anyone with the WolkeBot Role.
ban.self: You can not ban me with my own command.
ban.no-mention: Please mention a User you want to ban.

roll.nan: Whatever you just send, please just add a whole number. :)
